content: picot earrings crochet pattern materials  for blue dmc cebelia crochet thread no 20 and 1 mm steel crochet hook  for white #50 crochet thread and 0 60 mm steel crochet hook  scissors tapestry needle for weaving ends  3 mm jump rings 2 pieces  fish hook earring findings jewelry pliers stitches used in this pattern - chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet dtc double treble_crochet yarn over hook 3 times picot chain 3 insert hook back into the center of the base st yo pull through all loops on hook http //www crochetknitjewelry etsy com/ size blue 2 5w x 3h cm white 1 5w x 2h cm row 1 chain 8 slip_stitch in 1st chain to form a ring row 2 chain 1 single_crochet 12 in ring slip_stitch to 1st row 3 turn chain 1 single_crochet 4 chain 6 slip_stitch into the center of the base st single_crochet 4 turn row 4 chain 2 *dtc in chain 6 space chain 1* repeate 4x dtc one more in chain 6 space chain 5 slip_stitch into the center of the base st *dtc in chain 6 space chain 1* repeat 4x dtc one more chain 2 slip_stitch to 1st st turn row 5 chain 1 *single_crochet 2 in chain space picot* repeat 5x single_crochet 3 picot single_crochet 3 in chain 5 space *picot single_crochet 2 in chain space* repeat 5x slip_stitch to next fasten_off weave in ends http //www crochetknitjewelry etsy com/
